makers.displaymaker: attributed to Peter Paul Rubens, 1577–1640; born Siegen, Germany; died Antwerp, Belgium

texts.textentryhtml: Jonathan Richardson Jr. (1694-1771; Lugt 2170). Sir Joshua Reynolds (1723–1792; Lugt 2364). Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (1868–1953); gifted to Princeton University Art Museum, 1945.
